Others: The Suns showed a pattern of starting the game slow and finishing it in nearly indestructible fashion.
The Suns started 6-20 from the field (30%) and two turnovers apiece from Grayson Allen and Kevin Durant.
Phoenix then proceeded to start quick in the second frame just to fall behind by 4 going into halftime.
The Suns broke out of their cold shooting in the second half and earned a victory to move to 5-1.
Grayson Allen, who struggled in the first few games, came alive, scoring 18 points and providing three blocks.
